name: Reiverr
description: Reiverr is a project that aims to create a single UI for interacting with TMDB, Jellyfin, Radarr and Sonarr, as well as be an alternative to Overseerr.
short_desc: Reiverr is a project that aims to create a single UI for interacting with TMDB, Jellyfin, Radarr and Sonarr, as well as be an alternative to Overseerr.
author: aleksilassila
